column4: hi, my ubuntu box is down with a 'broken' upgrade ... unfortunately I forgot what version I was running, so I'm finding it hard to work out what to read here: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FeistyUpgrades (for example)
can someone tell me how to determine my current ubuntu version (I have a shell)
looks like I should have done a sequential upgrade
if I am 6.06.2.LTS, should I go to 7.04 LTS then 8.4?
I am 6.06.2 LTS, where should I go? 8.04 lTS?
as the doc suggests <quote> upgrade from an LTS release to the next LTS release (for example, Ubuntu 6.06 LTS to Ubuntu 8.04 LTS)  </quote>
and should I try to do that in one step?
I don't have the applet either
